titleStmt.title: Mercurius rusticus, or, A countrey messenger informing divers things worthy to be taken notice of, for the furtherance of those proceedings which concerne the publique peace and safety.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Thomason Coll.
Attributed to George Wither. cf. Thomason Coll.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
